item.title: Idling cars in street parking, 10th January

item.title: Big, deep pothole. Spilling onto pavement., 10th January
item.description:
4m pothole has been here one month and is getting deeper and wider. Road surface is rutted, with a pronounced edge that vehicles are hitting. Displaced road surface is all over the pavement and is likely a danger to pedestrians.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Charlton Road, Charlton
Report on FixMyStreet
